translation.text-main-description: Hi! I'm Santiago, a FullStack Developer from Argentina. I'm a self-taught developer, I love to learn new technologies and I'm always looking for new challenges.
translation.text-experience-forit-description: I'am a full-stack developer with +{{year}} years of experience focusing on front end. I have worked with different technologies, from the most modern and popular to the most traditional and specific.
translation.text-experience-forit-tasks: Development of interfaces for apps and websites
translation.text-experience-forit-technologies: Using Canva as a design tool, React with Typescript for coding, TailwindCSS for styling, and TanStackQuery for data retrieval.
translation.text-experience-forit-practices: Debugging tasks, clean code, functional programming.
translation.text-experience-description: I'am a full-stack developer with +{{year}} years of experience focusing on front end. I have worked with different technologies, from the most modern and popular to the most traditional and specific.

translation.text-experience-venedicto-technologies: Using Canva as a design tool, React with Typescript for coding, TailwindCSS for styling, and TanStackQuery for data retrieval.

translation.text-experience-freelance-tasks: Server Development, APIREST, Microservices, Websites, and Landing Pages.
translation.text-experience-freelance-technologies: Use of React with Typescript for code and libraries such as TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, and MaterialUI for user-friendly interfaces. Redux for state management, MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB as databases.
translation.text-experience-freelance-practices: Debugging tasks, Test-Driven Development, Clean Architecture, Clean Code, Functional Programming, and Object-Oriented Programming.
